author: Magyar Nemzet
title: Ground News - Hungary needs peace. The name of peace: Donald Trump
text:
Summary by Magyar Nemzet On his Facebook page, Viktor Orbán appreciated his meeting with former US President Donald Trump on Friday. Share menu 2 Articles 2 Articles All Left Center Right
Magyar Nemzet Hungary needs peace. The name of peace: Donald Trump On his Facebook page, Viktor Orbán appreciated his meeting with former US President Donald Trump on Friday.
4 hours ago · Budapest, Hungary Read Full Article
Magyar Nemzet
Hungary needs peace. The name of peace: Donald Trump On his Facebook page, Viktor Orbán appreciated his meeting with former US President Donald Trump on Friday.
4 hours ago · Budapest, Hungary Read Full Article echo24.cz Hungary needs peace and peace is Donald Trump, Orbán said after meeting with Trump “President Trump was a president of peace, he inspired respect in the world and thereby created the conditions for peace. During his presidency, there was peace in the Middle East and peace was also in Ukraine,” Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orbán said in a video post on Facebook after his Friday meeting with former US President Donald Trump at his residence in Mar-a-Lago, Florida. According to Orbán, there would be no war today if Trump were …
